Package com.example.cardiac_monitor

Class MyDatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
com.example.cardiac_monitor.MyDatabaseHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class MyDatabaseHelper extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
A helper class for managing a SQLite database for cardiac data. Provides methods for creating, upgrading, inserting, updating, and retrieving data from the database.

    • onUpgrade

      public void onUpgrade(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase sqLiteDatabase, int i, int i1)
      Called when the database needs to be upgraded.
      Specified by:
      onUpgrade in class android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      Parameters:
      sqLiteDatabase - The SQLite database instance.
      i1 - The old version of the database.
      i - The new version of the database.

    • insertData

      public long insertData(String systolic, String diastolic, String pre_stat, String pulse, String pul_stat, String date, String time, String comments)
      Inserts data into the cardiac_details table in the database.
      Parameters:
      systolic - The systolic value to be inserted.
      diastolic - The diastolic value to be inserted.
      pre_stat - The pressure status to be inserted.
      pulse - The pulse value to be inserted.
      pul_stat - The pulse status to be inserted.
      date - The date to be inserted.
      time - The time to be inserted.
      comments - The comments to be inserted.
      Returns:
      The row ID of the newly inserted record.

    • updateData

      public Boolean updateData(String id, String systolic, String diastolic, String pre_stat, String pulse, String pul_stat, String date, String time, String comments)
      Updates data in the cardiac_details table in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the record to be updated.
      systolic - The new systolic value.
      diastolic - The new diastolic value.
      pre_stat - The new pressure status.
      pulse - The new pulse value.
      pul_stat - The new pulse status.
      date - The new date.
      time - The new time.
      comments - The new comments.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteData

      public long deleteData(String id)
      Deletes a record from the database based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the record to be deleted.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the deletion operation.

    • populateListViewFromDB

      public android.widget.SimpleCursorAdapter populateListViewFromDB()
      Populates a ListView with data retrieved from the database.
      Returns:
      A SimpleCursorAdapter for binding data to the ListView.
